title: Local Deliveries, on time
text: We are ready to help you with local deliveries. Our software allows you to send a package to your customer in a few given steps, and we will take care of the rest!

section.title: Why Speedmail?
section.content: We know how important it is to deliver your package on time on a tight deadline. We are here to help you with that!

section.title: From A to B, we've got you covered.
section.content: Depending on the size of your package, we will choose the best option to deliver your package on time.
